topics.body:
Okay, so let's talk about Uta for a second.
!http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/tokyoghoul/images/6/64/Uta2.png/revision/latest?cb=20140830152236!
Okay, this may just be my prejudice for tattoos but his tattoos seem really stupid especially in his situation. Like the whole point of Ghouls getting masks is so they aren't identified when they're fighting the CCG forces. SO WHY DOES HE HAVE TATTOOS? That defeats the ENTIRE purpose of wearing a mask because the CCG could still identify him using the tattoos.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff
